advancements.aristotles_comedy.alchemy.f: Resuscitate a Philosopher's Stone by filling it up with humors
advancements.aristotles_comedy.alchemy.t: Transmute one of each common metal into a noble metal inside of a Philosopher's Stone
advancements.aristotles_comedy.alchemy.o: Complete the Great Work and achieve perfection
advancements.aristotles_comedy.alchemy.c: Complete the Great Work and achieve perfection... by doing nothing at all
